name: EtherScore
introduce: EtherScore is a decentralized on-chain reputation system for blockchains’ users and Dapps. EtherScore certifies on-chain reputations of Ethereum users based on previous actions (transaction history); user’s activity is represented by NFTs reflecting the concept of collectible badges. Anyone can issue badges to identify and target specific users based on one or more minting conditions (ex: “having done 10 swaps on Uniswap”) with no-code.
